description: Lenart Kova, acting on a Council request, seals the analog lines to restrict returnee communication and ensure all statements pass through official 'reconciliation' channels.
Returnees are escorted to closed Council-Directorate sessions where they are urged to contribute to drafted statements about their disappearance.
Manipulative language is inserted by Directorate-aligned Council members into the drafted reconciliation statements, framing detainments as necessary security actions.
Leaked drafts of the manipulated 'reconciliation' statements begin circulating through analog and word-of-mouth channels, exposing the Council's attempt to legitimize detainments.
Protests surge throughout the city as citizens, angered by the Council’s manipulation and exclusion of returnee voices, demand genuine reform and accountability.
